# Gabriele Selli Nunes — Data Portfolio (EN/PT)


This repository hosts my bilingual (EN/PT) portfolio built for GitHub Pages. It showcases direct links to my public data projects (no subpages). Focus areas include causal inference (DiD, RDD), NLP, and public policy evaluation.


Este repositório contém meu portfólio bilíngue (EN/PT) para GitHub Pages. Ele apresenta links diretos para meus projetos públicos (sem páginas internas). Áreas de foco: inferência causal (DiD, RDD), PLN e avaliação de políticas públicas.


## Live site
Enable GitHub Pages in **Settings → Pages**: choose **Deploy from branch** (main, root). Your site will be available at `https://<username>.github.io/<repo>`.


## Structure
- `index.html` – one‑page site with EN/PT toggle and project cards linking straight to GitHub repos.
- `assets/style.css` – minimal styling.
- (Optional) `assets/avatar.jpg` and `assets/cv.pdf`.


## Customize
1. Replace links (GitHub, LinkedIn, CV, email) in `index.html`.
2. Swap `assets/avatar.jpg` with your photo (optional).
3. Update card summaries (one‑liners) with key KPIs if desired.
